5.18 Server
===========

It specifies the hostname or the IPv4 address of a server.

Type: Server (Choice)

.. list-table::
   :widths: 3 5 5 5 45
   :header-rows: 1

   * - ID
     - Name
     - Type
     - #
     - Description
   * - 1
     - hostname
     - Hostname
     - 1
     - Hostname of the server
   * - 2
     - ipv4-addr
     - IPv4-Addr
     - 1
     - 32-bit IPv4 address as defined in RFC0791
